attributes.action: Require Companies to notify candidates of their application status
attributes.additional_details:
Thousands of people that apply for jobs in this country are getting no response about their job applications. Majority of those who get a response don't even get feedback or the opportunity to get feedback.

In Ontario Canada, a new law is coming January 1st 2026 to make it a legal requirement for companies with 25 or more staff to inform candidates whether the position they applied for has been filled within 45 days of the last interview.
attributes.background: Make it a legal requirement for companies to inform candidates that they haven't gotten through the application stage or that haven't received a position after an interview within a reasonable time period.

rejection.details:
This is a duplicate of this open petition (below):

Require employers to send responses to all job applications: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/742375
